content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.Answer (a), (b), and (c).Briefly explain ONE historical factor that attracted internal migration to the American South and West during the period from 1980 to 2000.Briefly describe ONE historical development in other regions that contributed to migration to the American South and West during the period from 1980 to 2000.Briefly explain ONE way in which internal migration contributed to political changes during the period from 1980 to 2000.

topic.text: 9.5: Migration and Immigration in the 1990s and 2000s

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
